borderRadius.$description: button.borderRadius — Default button border radius (4px). Use for consistent alignment with inputs.

md.$description: button.fontSize.md — Medium button font size. Uses sm for better proportions.

xl.$description: button.fontSize.xl — Extra large button font size.

xs.$description: button.fontSize.xs — Extra small button font size.

fontWeight.$description: button.fontWeight — Button font weight. Semibold for clear affordance.

lg.$description: button.height.lg — Large button height. Use for prominent CTAs.

md.$description: button.height.md — Medium button height. DEFAULT for most buttons.

sm.$description: button.height.sm — Small button height. Use for secondary actions, compact layouts.

xl.$description: button.height.xl — Extra large button height. Use for marketing CTAs.

xs.$description: button.height.xs — Extra small button height. Use for inline actions, compact toolbars.

lg.$description: button.padding.horizontal.lg — Large horizontal padding (24px). Use for prominent CTA buttons.

md.$description: button.padding.horizontal.md — Medium horizontal padding (16px). Use for standard buttons. DEFAULT.

sm.$description: button.padding.horizontal.sm — Small horizontal padding (12px). Use for secondary action buttons.

xl.$description: button.padding.horizontal.xl — Extra large horizontal padding (32px). Use for marketing buttons.

xs.$description: button.padding.horizontal.xs — Extra small horizontal padding (8px). Use for compact icon buttons.

duration.$description: button.transition.duration — Button transition duration for hover/active states.
